text.jpText: ねえ、三日月あなたも 迷う時があるの？
text.enText: Hey, Crescent Moon  Are there times where you ever felt lost as well?

text.jpText: 手かざせば今夜も たおやかな光
text.enText: If we reach out our hand again towards the sky tonight  We'd feel your graceful light

text.jpText: 朧げにただ 浮かぶ明かりを
text.enText: As the light floats in uncertainty

text.jpText: 追いかけて駆けだすの
text.enText: We can't help but chase after that glow

text.jpText: 声にならずに消えた想い
text.enText: Filled with these emotions that disappeared

text.jpText: 私のささやかな祈り今
text.enText: Right now, my smallest of prayers
Has just been thrown into the vast sky

text.jpText: いつかあなたのように誰かのことを
text.enText: Someday, I just want to be someone like you

text.jpText: 照らせる人になりたいだけ
text.enText: A person that makes others shine
